games.name: Moral Verse
games.description: Moral Verse is a metaverse game where players can participate in various activities to earn points, which can be redeemed for real-world rewards.

games.name: JoyJoy! Surprise Card
games.description: Gacha Card Game with Real Rewards is a mobile-optimized 2D gacha game where players can collect vouchers to redeem real-world rewards.

web.name: TarotWhisper
web.description: A personal project that allows users to search for the meaning of tarot cards and randomly draw cards for fortune-telling.

web.name: User Management System
web.description: A personal project to create, delete, update, and edit user names using React and a JSON server.

web.name: Find Your Perfect Dog Breed
web.description: A personal project that helps users find a dog breed matching their preferences, with categories based on size and detailed breed information.
